__e: When you are just a guest, you cannot feel that secure.
Whatever happens in a guestroom doesn't leave the room
There is much blood. It is not the sort of things to look at, you know what I mean?
Yesterday... the guest in room 9 sent for me to see how badly his bed was made.
I saw what you did to the lodger in Room 4... when you wanted to get the money for your pig farm.
But why should I be someone's guest when I have a house!
I just feel like a guest in your house.
I mean, it was bad because there was a lot of work... but there was a lodger in that house.
I'm living on borrowed time, in a house that don't even belongs to me. with a woman that don't want to have anything to do with me!
Your friend's days as Metropol guest are coming to an end.
If you're not a guest of the hotel, you've no business being up here.
And I know I haven't been the world's greatest houseguest.
